pages.title: Eroded Ender Pear
pages.text: Ender pearl but eroded.You can feel its power in your hand,but $(4)never try to use it.$()

pages.title: Void Ore
pages.text: You only can find this rarely in The End ,It $(9)buried underground$() .$(br)  you should mining it with $(9)diamond pickaxe or better$(). If you have a $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/charged_gun_powder)charged gunpowder$() this pearl will very useful.
